entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:43 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -11.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ogoki Post Airport 12:40 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -11.6°C
Pressure: 99.3 kPa
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -12.7°C
Wind: NNW 41 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
